item.title: About
item.description: Who’s hands behind the keyboard? I guess that’s a fair question to ask, but I’ll try my best to keep this in a way that I respect my privacy, but I can say that I’m an IT Security Professional, who’s been an hacker its whole life and got driven always through self-motivation. I had of course on my side my friends, my wife and professionals who challenged me along the way to become better and learn from each and every mistake and successes I’ve done through this path.

item.title: Firstone
